title: Kanzen Shouri Daiteiou
synopsis: When an alien force attacks Earth, a giant sword falls onto the campus of Paradise Elementary School, transforming it into a flying vessel. The fate of the planet lies with one group of kids who must pilot powerful mecha to stop the invaders before it's too late!
staff: [['Taniguchi, Gorou', ['Storyboard']], ['Yatate, Hajime', ['Original Creator']], ['Genma, Nobuhiko', ['Key Animation']], ['Moriyasu, Yasunao', ['Background Art']]]
